system.biography:
TitleFFF 417-2 Servant
Birthday1 Azura 705
AppearanceAge 14, height 4â 11â, light frame, weight 100 lb, attractive appearance, medium complexion, brown hair, hazel eyes
Medical/PsycheNone
Size4
ArmorCloth dress, tunic, and vest. Carries a small knife, and a club if herding livestock.
Other EquipmentBelt pouch
Valuables9d in silver in a money pouch
Notes

Biography

Matilda is the seventh and youngest child in a family of serfs living on a large and well managed manor estate. She has always been something of an âoddâ child, and somewhat unpopular with her older siblings, though she is the apple of her motherâs eye. Her mother arranged to get Matilda employment as a cook within the manor house, a position she started only a few weeks ago.

Matildaâs mother has a psionic talent, and recognizes that her daughter is developing talents as well. She has cautioned Matilda to keep her powers hidden. Even her mother does not realize the true depth of Matildaâs psionic potential. For the past four years, Matilda has been practicing her talents while tending to the sheep and goats, taking them to pastures unlikely to be visited by others. Matilda has a fondness for animals, and often adopts one as her pet. Her current pet is a young tomcat she has dubbed Sir Fuzzywhiskers.

Having grown up hearing folklore stories about Genin and the âWizardâs Isleâ, it is Matildaâs dream to go t Melderyn Island and become a Wizard. Since becoming a cook at the manor house, she has been working on a plan to fulfil her dream.

Adventure Hooks

Chance Encounter: A PC Shek Pâvar encounters Matilda at the market or some other public area. They are alerted to her high Aura and potential. Now, what to do about it?

Visions: Matilda has a prescient vision regarding the PCs. She seeks them out to offer warning or information from the vision.

Oh My Head: Matilda has started having episodes related to Mental Bolt; everyone around her is experiencing headaches. This will last for two to three weeks then go away as she masters the talent.

On the Run: Matilda has put her plan into action and is headed to Melderyn. She can be an encounter on the road, or PCs could be employed by the manor lord to retrieve his wayward cook.

The Witch: Someone witnessed Matilda practicing one of her powers and accused her of being a witch. Now all sorts of things have been blamed on her, and the manor lord has had her incarcerated awaiting trial for witchcraft. Matildaâs mother begs the PCs to free her daughter and see her safely away from the manor.

The Secret: Practicing her telepathy, Matilda learned a powerful secret. Now she is asking the PCs to help her reach the capitol and share this secret with the King. She will entrust the secret to no one else.

Credits

This character is taken from âFriends, Foes, and Followers, Vol. 1â on Lythia.com (https://www.lythia.com/game_aides/friends-foes-followers-volume-1/), by Kerry Mould, with illustrations by Richard Luscheck and Juha Makkonen, and is âfanonâ, a derivative work of copyrighted material by Columbia Games Inc. and N. Robin Crossby.
